content: whether you call it cute nerdy or simply ncc-1701-x this amigurumi is a great way to put a lot of trek in a tiny package great as a tree ornament above a crib hanging from your desk lamp or rear view mirror check state laws of course or for cuddling on the couch if you make a really big one this pattern is a general approximation of various early models of the uss enterprise choose colors and embroider as you please so as to do justice to your favorite ncc-1701 version **materials needed ** approximately 25 grams of gray dk yarn small amounts of dk or similar yarn in embellishment colors i used white black red and blue 3 25mm crochet hook us size d or appropriate size for your yarn tapestry needle small amounts of stuffing **skills needed ** basic crochet stitches invisible decrease french knot basic embroidery and assembly **finished size ** about 3-3/4 long update january 31 2012 new pattern version available with many additional images please update your libraries to make sure you have starship_enterprise_amigurumi-b pdf not -a pdf
